iwildcam-2020-fgvc7: A computer vision multiclass classification task assigning species labels (including a no-animal class) to camera-trap images under distribution shift across locations. Performance is evaluated by top-1 accuracy.
text-normalization-challenge-russian-lan: A natural language processing sequence-to-sequence task that performs token-level text normalization, predicting the spoken form of each token. Evaluation is based on token-level exact-match accuracy.
hubmap-kidney-segmentation: An image segmentation task in computer vision on histology microscopy images, predicting binary masks for specific anatomical structures. Performance is evaluated using the mean Dice coefficient across images.
tabular-playground-series-dec-2021: A tabular multi-class classification task predicting categorical land-cover labels from structured terrain and soil features. Predictions are class labels and evaluated by accuracy.
3d-object-detection-for-autonomous-vehic: A multi-modal 3D object detection task in computer vision using camera images, LiDAR point clouds, and structured metadata/maps to predict 3D bounding boxes and class labels in world coordinates. Evaluated by mean Average Precision across 3D IoU thresholds.
plant-pathology-2020-fgvc7: A computer vision multi-label classification task predicting per-label probabilities of several conditions from images, evaluated by mean ROC AUC across labels.
iwildcam-2019-fgvc6: A computer vision classification task predicting categorical wildlife species labels, including an “empty” class, from camera trap images. The training and test sets come from different regions, introducing domain shift.
the-icml-2013-whale-challenge-right-whal: A binary audio classification task detecting the presence of a specific acoustic event in short clips, outputting probabilities for the positive class and evaluated by AUC-ROC.
whale-categorization-playground: A computer vision multi-class classification task for image-based individual identification, requiring top-5 ranked label predictions per image (with an unknown-class option), evaluated by MAP@5.
us-patent-phrase-to-phrase-matching: A natural language processing regression task predicting continuous semantic similarity scores for pairs of text phrases, conditioned on domain context to identify semantically similar terms in technical documents.
herbarium-2021-fgvc8: A fine-grained computer vision task performing multi-class classification of single images, predicting categorical species labels from specimen photographs.
nomad2018-predict-transparent-conductors: A multi-target regression task in materials science, predicting two continuous properties from tabular features and per-sample 3D atomic structure data.
text-normalization-challenge-english-lan: A natural language processing sequence-to-sequence task for token-level text normalization, predicting the normalized form of each token in text. Predictions are exact string outputs per token, evaluated by token-level exact-match accuracy.
predict-volcanic-eruptions-ingv-oe: A time series regression task predicting continuous time-to-event values from multivariate sensor signals.
herbarium-2020-fgvc7: A computer vision task performing fine-grained multi-class classification of plant species from herbarium specimen images. The label distribution is long-tailed, and performance is evaluated using macro F1.
plant-pathology-2021-fgvc8: A computer vision multi-label classification task assigning disease labels to RGB images of leaves, evaluated by mean F1 score.
histopathologic-cancer-detection: An image-based binary classification task in medical imaging, predicting whether small histopathology patches contain tumor tissue within a defined central region.
herbarium-2022-fgvc9: An image classification task for fine-grained recognition of biological specimens, predicting a categorical species label from single-image inputs. Evaluated with macro F1 to emphasize performance across a long-tailed class distribution.
inaturalist-2019-fgvc6: A computer vision multiclass classification task predicting fine-grained categorical labels from images.
leaf-classification: A multimodal classification task combining tabular features and images to predict a categorical label. Models must output class probability distributions for many classes, evaluated with multi-class logarithmic loss.
kuzushiji-recognition: A computer vision object detection task on document images, requiring detection and classification of individual characters by predicting a point location and its categorical label for each instance. Training provides bounding boxes, while evaluation uses a point-in-box matching scheme with a modified F1 score.
tweet-sentiment-extraction: A natural language processing span-extraction task that, given a short text and its sentiment label, predicts the exact substring that best supports that sentiment.
detecting-insults-in-social-commentary: A natural language processing task performing binary text classification on user comments, requiring probability outputs for the target class and evaluated by AUC-ROC.
seti-breakthrough-listen: A computer vision binary classification task detecting the presence of target signals in multi-observation spectrogram images. Inputs are stacked 2D time–frequency representations, and the model outputs a probability of signal presence.
denoising-dirty-documents: A computer vision regression task predicting per-pixel continuous grayscale intensities to denoise images.
mlsp-2013-birds: A multi-label audio classification task predicting which categories are present in short sound clips.
h-and-m-personalized-fashion-recommendat: A multimodal recommender systems ranking task using tabular, time-series, text, and image data. The goal is to generate top-N item recommendations per user from past interactions and metadata, evaluated with MAP@K.
google-quest-challenge: A natural language processing task performing multi-target regression to predict continuous [0,1] subjective quality scores (e.g., helpfulness, relevance, writing quality) for question–answer text pairs.
rsna-miccai-brain-tumor-radiogenomic-cla: A computer vision task performing binary classification from multi-sequence 3D MRI scans to predict a patient-level label. Predictions are probabilistic and evaluated using ROC AUC.
hotel-id-2021-fgvc8: A fine-grained image classification task predicting categorical identifiers from images, evaluated using top-5 mean average precision (MAP@5).
cassava-leaf-disease-classification: A computer vision multi-class classification task predicting categorical disease or healthy labels from plant leaf images.
dogs-vs-cats-redux-kernels-edition: A computer vision task performing binary image classification, requiring probabilistic predictions for each image. Evaluated using binary cross-entropy (log loss).
aerial-cactus-identification: A computer vision task performing binary classification to detect the presence of a specific object in low-resolution aerial images.
aptos2019-blindness-detection: A computer vision classification task predicting a five-level ordered category from medical images.
random-acts-of-pizza: A natural language processing and tabular classification task predicting the likelihood that an online request succeeds, using the request text and associated user/post metadata.
freesound-audio-tagging-2019: An audio multi-label classification task tagging sound clips with one or more categories. Models output per-class probabilities for each clip and are evaluated with a label-ranking average precision metric.
learning-agency-lab-automated-essay-scor: A natural language processing task performing ordinal text classification to predict holistic quality scores (on a fixed scale) from essay content.
stanford-covid-vaccine: A bioinformatics multi-output regression task on tabular features derived from biological sequence data, predicting per-position continuous values using sequence and structural context.
jigsaw-toxic-comment-classification-chal: A natural language processing task performing multi-label classification of text comments, predicting probabilities for multiple toxicity categories.
spooky-author-identification: A natural language processing multi-class classification task performing authorship attribution by predicting the author label of short sentence-level text excerpts.
AI4Code: A natural language processing ranking task predicting the correct permutation of cells in notebook-style documents, ordering explanatory text relative to code to restore coherent flow.
alaska2-image-steganalysis: A computer vision binary classification task detecting hidden content in images. The model outputs a continuous likelihood score per image and is evaluated with a weighted ROC AUC emphasizing low false-positive rates.
billion-word-imputation: A natural language processing sequence reconstruction task that restores full sentences by inserting a single missing word at the correct position. Performance is evaluated by mean character-level edit (Levenshtein) distance to the original sentences.
bms-molecular-translation: An OCR-style image-to-text task transcribing structured character sequences from images. Performance is evaluated by mean Levenshtein (edit) distance.
cdiscount-image-classification-challenge: A computer vision task performing extreme multi-class classification of product categories from one or more images per item, evaluated by top-1 accuracy.
chaii-hindi-and-tamil-question-answering: A natural language processing task for extractive question answering, predicting exact answer text from provided context passages. Performance is evaluated using word-level Jaccard similarity.
champs-scalar-coupling: A tabular regression task in computational chemistry predicting a continuous interaction strength between atom pairs in molecules from atom types, coupling categories, and 3D structural/quantum-derived features.
dog-breed-identification: A computer vision task for fine-grained multi-class classification from images, predicting categorical labels with probability outputs across many classes. Performance is evaluated using multi-class log loss.
facebook-recruiting-iii-keyword-extracti: A natural language processing multi-label classification task predicting sets of tags for text documents based on their titles and bodies.
google-research-identify-contrails-reduc: A computer vision semantic segmentation task on multispectral, time-sequenced satellite imagery, predicting binary pixel masks of target atmospheric features. Submissions use run-length–encoded masks and are evaluated with a global Dice coefficient.
hms-harmful-brain-activity-classificatio: A time-series classification task on multichannel EEG signals and spectrogram features, predicting a probability distribution over multiple brain activity pattern classes.
icecube-neutrinos-in-deep-ice: A tabular regression task predicting continuous directional angles (azimuth and zenith) from structured multichannel sensor pulse data, evaluated by angular error.
imet-2020-fgvc7: A computer vision multi-label classification task predicting sets of categorical attributes from images, evaluated with micro-averaged F1.
jigsaw-unintended-bias-in-toxicity-class: A natural language processing task for binary text classification that predicts toxicity in comments and outputs calibrated probability scores, with emphasis on fairness across demographic subgroups.
lmsys-chatbot-arena: A natural language processing classification task that, given a prompt and two text responses, predicts which response is preferred or if the result is a tie by outputting class probabilities.
multi-modal-gesture-recognition: A multimodal sequence classification task in computer vision and audio, predicting ordered gesture label sequences from synchronized video and audio data.
new-york-city-taxi-fare-prediction: A tabular regression task predicting a continuous trip cost from pickup/dropoff geolocations, timestamps, and passenger count.
nfl-player-contact-detection: A multimodal classification task combining multi-view video and synchronized tracking time-series data to predict binary contact events between entity pairs at fixed time intervals. The target is a binary label indicating contact occurrence.
osic-pulmonary-fibrosis-progression: A multimodal time-series forecasting task in healthcare using images and structured tabular data to predict a continuous physiological measurement over future weeks. The model outputs both the numerical forecast and an uncertainty estimate for each time point.
petfinder-pawpularity-score: A multimodal regression task predicting a continuous popularity/engagement score for images using both image content and associated tabular photo metadata.
ranzcr-clip-catheter-line-classification: A computer vision multi-label classification task on medical images, predicting probabilities for multiple binary labels per image.
rsna-breast-cancer-detection: A medical imaging classification task predicting cancer probability from multi-view images, with outputs aggregated to a single case-level probability. Models may incorporate accompanying structured metadata.
siim-covid19-detection: A computer vision task combining object detection and multi-label classification on image data, requiring localization of findings with bounding boxes and prediction of multiple categorical labels per case.
siim-isic-melanoma-classification: A computer vision binary classification task predicting malignancy probabilities from medical images, optionally leveraging structured patient and site metadata.
smartphone-decimeter-2022: A time series regression task predicting geolocation (latitude/longitude) per timestamp from sequential multi-sensor data (e.g., GNSS and inertial measurements).
statoil-iceberg-classifier-challenge: A computer vision binary classification task predicting probabilities for a binary label from dual-channel radar image patches.
tabular-playground-series-may-2022: A tabular binary classification task predicting a 0/1 label from structured features that combine continuous and categorical variables, evaluated with ROC AUC.
tensorflow-speech-recognition-challenge: An audio classification task recognizing spoken command categories from 1-second speech clips, predicting one label from a fixed set (including silence/unknown) for each clip.
tensorflow2-question-answering: A natural language processing extractive question answering task predicting answer spans or yes/no labels from document text, evaluated by micro-averaged F1 across long and short answers.
tgs-salt-identification-challenge: A computer vision image segmentation task predicting pixel-wise binary masks from images, optionally leveraging auxiliary tabular metadata.
uw-madison-gi-tract-image-segmentation: A computer vision image segmentation task predicting binary masks for multiple anatomical structures from 2D medical MRI slices.
ventilator-pressure-prediction: A time series forecasting task predicting continuous measurements at each time step from sequential control inputs and system parameters.
vesuvius-challenge-ink-detection: A computer vision binary segmentation task predicting pixel-level masks of regions of interest from 3D volumetric scan slices.
vinbigdata-chest-xray-abnormalities-dete: An object detection task in computer vision that predicts bounding boxes and categorical labels from medical images, evaluated using mean Average Precision at a specified IoU threshold.
